\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\& S \&\& S \&\& M \\
	{P_{\beta}} \&\& {P_{\beta+1}} \&\& R
	\arrow[equals, from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{\iota_\beta}", hook, from=1-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["q", from=1-4, to=1-6]
	\arrow["\delta", from=1-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\pi _\beta}", two heads, from=2-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\alpha _\beta}"', from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\pi _{\beta +1}}", two heads, from=2-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{\delta \circ \pi _{\beta +1}}"', from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["r"', from=2-5, to=1-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
